parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From sun and phero; to bear together, i.e. to collect, or to conduce; especially advantage.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Last year, a year ago. Adverb from peras; the by-gone, i.e. last year.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To begin before. From pro and enarchomai; to commence already.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Alone, but, only. Neuter of monos as adverb; merely.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
